Ordak A Demon Chronicle is a one-man project (except the musics by Makimak) no linear top-down action-rpg inspired by the legend of ZELDA 1 and UNDERTALE presented in a rigorously-period 16 bit style.

Use the keyboard or the xbox controller to play(I don't try other joypads...) You can switch in game by pressing "K" or "J".

Explore, fight and defeat bosses to grab new weapons (some of which allow access to shortcuts), Ordak features action-adventure style gameplay (the majority of the fights during exploration are similar to Zelda 1 or 3 but some specific fights are in the same way than Undertale)

You can play and replay this game many times cause there are many different paths and you can finish the game by taking different paths.

And don't forget to try new skills you can choose at the beginning.

Thank you all to make this game happens!

All about it on the kickstarter campaign below:
